00731 template<typename Predicate>
00732 struct unary_negate
00733 {
00734   __host__ __device__
00735   unary_negate(Predicate p) : pred(p){}
00736 
00739   template<typename T>
00740   __host__ __device__
00741   bool operator()(const T x) { return !pred(x); }
00742 
00743   Predicate pred;
00744 }; // end unary_negate

00762 template<typename Predicate>
00763   __host__ __device__
00764   unary_negate<Predicate> not1(Predicate &pred);
00765 
00776 template<typename Predicate>
00777 struct binary_negate
00778 {
00779   __host__ __device__
00780   binary_negate(Predicate p) : pred(p){}
00781 
00784   template<typename T>
00785   __host__ __device__
00786   bool operator()(const T x, const T y) { return !pred(x,y); }
00787 
00788   Predicate pred;
00789 }; // end binary_negate
